about_the_game:
Santa is the nice jolly man you wouldn't think would hurt a single soul. He brings kids joy by giving them presents and toys. But where does he get these toys? Why from the Toyshop of course!

The Toyshop, a wondrous place that Santa designed specifically to create and design specially hand crafted toys for all the kids in the world. At least, that is what Santa wants people see for the true nature of these toys are more than you know.

As the shop grows quiet, and day turns to night, a glimpse of a toy comes to life. We all know that toys never come alive, in the day or night, and Santa knows this very well indeed. So what does he do when something doesn't go his way? He sends out his fellow Toy Makers to correct his accidental creation of life.

Toys beware for your body isn't the only thing they are after, it wants your soul. Run from it, Hide from it, if you want to have a life, you must find out how to escape Santa's Toyshop. Its always better when we're together but in the end its every Toy for themselves.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Welcome to Soulless Creation where your life is not the only thing that is at stake here. You and your fellow playmates must work together completing tasks to turn on the escape pods of the Toyshop. Being a lone wolf isn't always beneficial but staying together is also detrimental. Find the balance in order to leave from the Toyshop for your good deeds can give you an edge, but can also come at a cost.
Play as either a living Toy or be the dreaded Toy-maker in this 1v5 escape game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 3300 G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 12

short_description: Soulless Creation is a 3D, first person horror escape game about sentient toys escaping with their souls from the dreaded Toymaker. Run, Swap, Hide as you complete various tasks around the shop to escape the impending doom that awaits you
